feed.title: SNAP Hydroponics
feed.subtitle: SNAP stands for Simple Nutrient Addition Program. It is a low-cost, low-maintenance hydroponics system that is designed for household and small-scale vegetable production.

entry.title: Hello!
entry.content:
Welcome! This is the unofficial website of SNAP. Please excuse the typos because it is still under construction. If you are intersted in getting started with SNAP hydroponics feel free to checkout the setup guide and the FAQ.

Feel free to join our group and follow our twitter.

Happy growing!
entry.summary: Welcome! This is the unofficial website of SNAP. Please excuse the typos because it is still under construction. If you are intersted in getting started with SNAP hydroponics feel free to checkout the setup guide and the FAQ.
